data.message: Hi Eminem :) I want You To Know That I love You So Much And EveryDay I listen  To Your Songs You are The Only One Who can Make Me Happy :( I really i Have A bad Life My Only Dream In Life Is see you But I know That I can't :( You Will Never Come To my Country And Even You will  Never Look At my Comment :( Oh My God I'm So Sad And I have a cancer in my eyes :( So In That Life I can't See You :( Sorry For My English I will See You in paradise  :) and I will Be with You In paradise Please Eminem answer Me :( even you say to me Fuck You :(
